existence: Filter by value present or missing
rangeHelp: Enter a range or a single value. E.g. 100,200 or 100. Or use blanks to have open ends like: 100,
rangeHelpYear: Enter a range or a single value. E.g. 2020,2023 or 1992. Or use blanks to have open ends like: 2000,
wildcardHelp: Searches are case insensitive, but every letter is distinct, so, to find records with Rio or RÃ­o, for example, you can use the pattern 'r?o'.
useWildcardPattern: Search for the pattern - * is a wildcard for any number of characters, ? is a wildcard for a single character

location.aboutWktAndGeoJson: Only WKT is supported, but we will attempt to convert any GeoJSON to WKT. If you have a large GeoJSON file, you can simplify it using [MapShaper](http://mapshaper.org/) and convert to WKT using [geojson.io](http://geojson.io/). Notice that only POINT, LINESTRING, LINEARRING, POLYGON and MULTIPOLYGON are accepted WKT types.
location.simplificationWarning: We can try to simplify the geometry, but this might lead to self-intersections or otherwise invalid geometries. In that case you need to correct the geometry manually or simplify the initial geometry.
location.orderChanged: The ordering of the coordinates was reversed as it was not counter clockwise
